original_text: A man was there by the name of Zacchaeus; he was a chief tax collector and was wealthy.
korean_text: 삭개오라 이름하는 자가 있으니 세리장이요 또한 부자라

sentences.original_text: A man was there by the name of Zacchaeus
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 세배라는 이름의 한 사람이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: he was a chief tax collector
